title: Love Redeemed
description: Life is simple.Cassie is content with what she has, a great job and wonderful friends. Everything is perfectâ€¦until Ryder appears. She still has not forgiven him for choosing music over her eight years ago.Ryder is a rock star, living the life he had always dreamed of. He is not searching for love because who has time for that when you're constantly on the road. But then his tour ends and he decides to go back home and visit an old friend.When those old feelings resurface, will they be able to forgive and start anew?
author: Tich Brewster
